Object Shape: Boomerang, Cigar, Cylinder, Disc, Flash, Oval, Sphere, Star-like, Teardrop, Triangle
divs: Sighting DetailsHave witnessed multiple UFO's every night since February 16th,hundreds of pictures,videos,and dozens of witnesses now after showing people.Miltary planes,fighter jets,and helicopter flyovers regularly. although not the greatest I have videos of UFO's shooting a red beam onto neighbors houses and what I assume they are doing is abducting people late at night,have witnessed this strange behavior numerous times,at least three separate types of ufo's here = Flying Discs or saucers,Triangles,and large cigar shaped. I watch UFO's come down from the sky at dusk and watch them move slowly about the area until daylight.Has my family on edge and concerned with all the activity so many,so often,will post some pics,videos are too time consuming to download.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Have witnessed multiple ufo's every night since mid-February,made 4 reports early on,have hundreds of videos and pictures,have witnessed three different types of UFO's,still ongoing.Have witnessed military planes and black helicopters,have some on digital
